purpose: Facilitates workflow automation by enabling users to create complex workflows with over 400 integrations
principle: Leverages a visual editor for workflow creation and a modular architecture to support integrations and custom code execution
reusability: Highly extensible with a plugin system, supports custom nodes and integrations, offers REST API for workflow execution
limitations: Requires technical knowledge for self-hosting, limited to integrations provided or custom developed
name: n8n
description: Fair-code workflow automation platform with native AI capabilities. Combine visual building with custom code, self-host or cloud, 400+ integrations.
highlight: Combines visual workflow building with extensive integration capabilities in a fair-code model
